title: traceroute hops are not visible (request timed out) cisco 3750
body:
I trace route from my machine to any external host I am able to reach the host but I am unable to find out which route it takes. I can see the hops until our edge router (3750 L3) to which the firewall is connected. 

  4     *        *        *     Request timed out.

5 * * * Request timed out. 6 * * * Request timed out. 7 * * * Request timed out. 8 * * * Request timed out. 9 * * * Request timed out. 10 * * * Request timed out. 11 * * * Request timed out. 12 * * * Request timed out. 13 * * * Request timed out. 14 * * * Request timed out. 15 * * * Request timed out. 16 * * * Request timed out. 17 * * * Request timed out. 18 * * * Request timed out. 19 459 ms 203 ms 124 ms redirect.redhat.com [209.132.183.105]

Trace complete.

But if I do it from the firewall i get it properly showing all the hope.

The firewall is connected to the the 3750. The internet traffic is going through the 3750s and through the firewall and is working fine.

Is it stp causing the issue?
